item.content: The iplay4e web site is a web application built on Google App Engine, and as such incorporates the terms of the Google App Engine Privacy Notice as well as the Google Privacy Policy. Those terms describe the rights and limitations assigned to you and to Google regarding your use of this application.

In addition, the following terms apply to iplay4e's use of your Google Account information:
We will store only the email address and nickname of your Google account.
We will not share or distribute that information with third parties.
The only account information that will be displayed on iplay4e will be the portion of your email address preceeding the @ symbol. Example: if your Google Account is associated with the email address someone@somewhere.com, we will display only "someone".
